metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of ground truth measurement synchronizing with the airborne WiDAS mission in the Yingke oasis and Huazhaizi desert steppe foci experimental areas on Jul. 11, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠加密观测区机载WiDAS地面同步观测数据集（2008年7月11日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of ground truth measurement synchronizing with the airborne WiDAS mission was obtained in the Yingke oasis and Huazhaizi desert steppe foci experimental areas on Jul. 11, 2008. WiDAS, composed of four CCD cameras, one mid-infrared thermal imager (AGEMA 550), and one infrared thermal imager (S60), can acquire CCD, MIR and TIR band data. The simultaneous ground data included:
     (1) Atmospheric parameters in Huazhaizi desert No. 2 plot from CE318 (produced by CIMEL in France). The total optical depth, aerosol optical depth, Rayleigh scattering coefficient, column water vapor in 936 nm, particle size spectrum and phase function were then retrieved from these observations. The optical depth in 1020nm, 936nm, 870nm, 670nm and 440nm were all acquired by CE318. Those data include the raw data in k7 format and can be opened by ASTPWin. ReadMe.txt is attached for details. Processed data (after retrieval of the raw data) in Excel format are on optical depth, Rayleigh scattering, aerosol optical depth, the horizontal visibility, the near surface air temperature, the solar azimuth, zenith, solar distance correlation factors, and air column mass number. 
     (2) Radiative temperature of maize, wheat and the bare land (in Yingke oasis maize field), vegetation and the bare land (Huazhaizi desert No. 2 plot) by the thermal cameras at a height of 1.2m above the ground. Optical photos of the scene were also taken. Raw data (read by ThermaCAM Researcher 2001) was archived in IMG format and radiative files are stored in Excel format. .
     (3) Photosynthesis by LI6400 in Yingke oasis maize field, carried out according to WATER specifications. Raw data were archived in the user-defined format  (by notepat.exe) and processed data were in Excel format.
     (4) Ground object reflectance spectra in Yingke oasis maize field, Huazhaizi maize field, Huazhaizi desert No. 1 and 2 plots, by ASD FieldSpec (350～2500 nm) from Institute of Remote Sensing Applications (IRSA), CAS. Raw data were binary files direct from ASD (by ViewSpecPro), which were recorded daily in detail, and pre-processed data on reflectance were in .txt format.
     (5) The radiative temperature in Huazhaizi desert No. 2 plot by the handheld infrared thermometer (BNU and IRSA). Raw data, blackbody calibrated data and processed data (in Excel format) were all archived.
     (6) FPAR (Fraction of Photosynthetically Active Radiation) by SUNSACN and the digital camera in Yingke oasis maize field. FPAR= (canopyPAR－surface transmissionPAR－canopy reflection PAR+surface reflectionPAR) /canopy PAR; APAR=FPAR* canopy PAR. Data were archived in Excel format.
     (7) The radiative temperature of the maize canopy by the automatic thermometer (FOV: 10°; emissivity: 0.95) mearsued at nadir with an time intervals of 1s in Huazhaizi desert maize field. Raw data, blackbody calibrated data and processed data were all archived as Excel files.
     (8) Maize albedo from two shortwave radiometer in Yingke oasis maize field. R =10H (R for FOV radius; H for the probe height). Data were archived in Excel format.
metadata.descriptionCn:
2008年7月11日在盈科绿洲与花寨子荒漠加密观测区进行了红外广角双模式成像仪WiDAS（Wide-angle Infrared Dual-mode line/area Array Scanner）飞行的地面同步观测。WiDAS由4个CCD相机、1个中红外热像仪（AGEMA 550）和1个热红外热像仪（S60）组成， 能同时获取可见光/近红外（CCD）波段5个角度、中红外波段（MIR）7个角度和热红外波段（TIR ）7个角度的数据。地面数据包括冠层辐射温度、植被光合作用速率、反照率、FPAR、热像仪数据、ASD光谱数据、冠层连续辐射温度、大气参数和大气水汽含量数据。
测量内容：
（1）CE318太阳分光光度计大气参数数据 本数据集为北师大CE318太阳分光光度计测量得到的大气参数。测量地点为花寨子荒漠样地2。 太阳分光光度计CE318通过直接太阳辐射测量数据，可以反演出非水汽通道的光学厚度、瑞利散射、气溶胶光学厚度，水汽通道936nm测量数据可以获得大气气柱的水汽含量，水平能见度也可从CE318数据导出。本次测量采用的北京师范大学的CE318，其可提供1020nm、936nm、870nm、670nm和440nm共5个波段的光学厚度，可以利用936nm测量数据反演大气柱水汽含量。 本数据包括原始数据和处理后的大气数据。原始数据以CE318特有文件格式*.k7存储，可用ASTPWin软件打开，并附带说明文件ReadMe.txt ；处理后文件包括利用原始数据反演获得光学厚度、瑞利散射、气溶胶光学厚度、水平能见度和近地表大气温度，以及参与计算的太阳方位角、天顶角、日地距离修正因子和大气柱质量数。 数据结果以Excel格式保存。 
（2）热像仪测量地表辐射温度数据。测量仪器有遥感所热像仪和北师大热像仪，测量对象分别为盈科绿洲玉米地内的玉米、小麦和裸土的辐射温度以及花寨子荒漠样地2的植被和裸土的辐射温度。仪器获取组分辐射温度数据，并同时拍摄同视场的光学照片。热像仪拍摄高度约为1.2m。 本数据包括原始数据与记录、仪器黑体定标数据。原始数据可利用配套处理软件ThermaCAM Researcher 2001，也可将数据在该软件中转换为其他格式，自行编程读取。仪器黑体定标数据以Excel格式存储。
（3）LI-6400光合仪数据。 测量对象为盈科绿洲玉米地。作过程请参考联合试验操作规范。 其数据包括原始数据和处理数据。 原始数据以仪器自定义格式保存，可用记事本等常用软件打开。处理数据以Excel保存。 
（4） ASD光谱仪数据。 利用ASD（Analytical Sepctral Devices）光谱仪测量盈科绿洲玉米地、花寨子玉米地、花寨子荒漠样地1和花寨子荒漠样地2的光谱数据。测量仪器为中国科学院遥感应用研究所的光谱仪（350-2500nm）和灰板。 数据包括原始数据与记录数据、处理后的反射率数据。 本数据的原始数据为ASD标准格式，可利用其自带软件ViewSpec打开。处理后的反射率数据以Excel格式保存。 
（5）手持式红外温度计测量的辐射温度数据。测量对象为盈科绿洲玉米地和花寨子荒漠样地2，测量仪器分别为遥感所手持式红外温度计和北师大的手持式红外温度计。数据包括原始数据与记录数据、经过黑体定标后的温度数据。原始数据为Word的doc格式。处理后数据以Excel格式保存。
（6）光合有效辐射比率（FPAR：Fraction of Photosynthetically Active Radiation）数据 测量地点为盈科绿洲玉米地。测量仪器为SUNSCAN冠层分析仪、数码相机。分上，下三段测量，并同时测量入射和反射PAR。二者比值即为光合有效辐射比率。 本数据以Excel保存。
（7）固定自记点温计测量的辐射温度数据，仪器定标数据以及测量地点坐标。测量样地为花寨子荒漠玉米样地。仪器为北师大固定自记点温计。测量对象为玉米冠层。仪器的视场角约为10°，垂直向下观测，采样间隔为1s。架设高度见数据文档。仪器设定比辐射率为0.95。 本数据包括原始数据与经过黑体定标、比辐射率纠正后的处理数据。均以Excel格式保存。 
（8）反照率数据，测量仪器为遥感所1号和2号短波辐射表，测量对象为盈科绿洲玉米地内的行播玉米。短波表的上表电压值，下表电压值，经过表的敏感系数转换成反照率数据。下表视场半径R与探头高度H的关系为：R =10H。本数据以Excel存储。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to gather atmospheric parameters in desert environments?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于收集沙漠环境中大气参数的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to gather atmospheric parameters in desert environments is the use of the CE318 sun photometer, which measures direct solar radiation to retrieve optical thickness, Rayleigh scattering, aerosol optical thickness, and atmospheric water vapor content.
Example.AnswerCn: 在沙漠环境中收集大气参数的一种数据收集方法是使用CE318太阳光度计，该仪器测量直接太阳辐射，以获取光学厚度、瑞利散射、气溶胶光学厚度和大气水汽含量。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific attributes measured by a wide-angle infrared dual-mode line/area array scanner in a dataset?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 宽角红外双模线/面阵扫描仪在数据集中测量的具体属性有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: visible/near-infrared bands at five angles, mid-infrared bands at seven angles, thermal infrared bands at seven angles, canopy radiation temperature, vegetation photosynthesis rate, albedo, FPAR, atmospheric parameters
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 可见/近红外波段在五个角度，中红外波段在七个角度，热红外波段在七个角度，冠层辐射温度，植被光合作用速率，反照率，FPAR，大气参数。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of various remote sensing instruments like CCD cameras, thermal imagers, and solar spectrometers improve the accuracy and depth of environmental data collection in desert and oasis regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 各种遥感仪器的集成，如CCD相机、热成像仪和太阳光谱仪，可以如何提高沙漠和绿洲地区环境数据收集的准确性和深度？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of multiple remote sensing instruments such as CCD cameras, thermal imagers, and solar spectrometers can enhance data collection by providing a comprehensive dataset across different spectral bands and observational angles. This multi-instrument approach allows for capturing detailed information on canopy radiation temperature, vegetation photosynthesis rate, and atmospheric parameters. Each instrument contributes unique data points; for example, CCD cameras capture visible and near-infrared angles, while infrared thermal imagers provide surface temperature data. The combination allows for cross-verification of data, improved calibration, and a more holistic understanding of environmental conditions in diverse landscapes like deserts and oases.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多种遥感仪器的集成，如CCD相机、热成像仪和太阳光谱仪，可以通过提供跨不同光谱波段和观测角度的综合数据集来增强数据收集。这种多仪器方法能够捕捉关于冠层辐射温度、植被光合作用速率和大气参数的详细信息。每种仪器都贡献独特的数据点；例如，CCD相机捕捉可见光和近红外角度，而红外热成像仪提供表面温度数据。这种组合允许数据的交叉验证、改进校准，并对沙漠和绿洲等多样化景观中的环境条件有更全面的理解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the complexity of accurately capturing surface temperature data using thermal imaging in diverse terrains such as oases and deserts?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在不同地形如绿洲和沙漠中，准确捕捉表面温度数据的复杂性受到哪些因素的影响？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The complexity of accurately capturing surface temperature data using thermal imaging in diverse terrains such as oases and deserts can be attributed to various factors. These include the heterogeneity of land cover types like maize fields, wheat fields, and bare soil, which require precise calibration and correction for emissivity. Additionally, the varying angles and heights of measurement, as well as the need for simultaneous optical imaging for context, add to the challenges. The necessity to calibrate instruments like thermal imagers with blackbody data and the influence of atmospheric parameters on thermal readings also contribute to the complexity.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在多样化地形（如绿洲和沙漠）中，准确捕捉表面温度数据的复杂性可以归因于多种因素。这些因素包括土地覆盖类型的异质性，如玉米田、小麦田和裸土，这些都需要精确的发射率校准和修正。此外，测量的角度和高度的变化，以及需要同时进行光学成像以提供背景信息，也增加了挑战。校准热成像仪器与黑体数据的必要性以及大气参数对热读数的影响也增加了复杂性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in synchronizing ground-based and airborne data collection for infrared imaging in desert and oasis environments?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在沙漠和绿洲环境中，同步地面和空中数据收集以进行红外成像涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The synchronization involves using the Wide-angle Infrared Dual-mode line/area Array Scanner (WiDAS), which includes CCD cameras and thermal imagers to collect visible, near-infrared, mid-infrared, and thermal infrared data simultaneously. Ground-based measurements include canopy radiation temperature, photosynthesis rate, albedo, FPAR, and atmospheric parameters. Instruments like CE318 sun photometer, thermal imagers, and spectrometers are utilized to gather complementary atmospheric and surface data, which are then processed and calibrated for analysis.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 同步过程涉及使用宽角红外双模式线/面阵扫描仪（WiDAS），该设备包括CCD相机和热成像仪，以同时收集可见光、近红外、中红外和热红外数据。地面测量包括冠层辐射温度、光合作用速率、反照率、FPAR和大气参数。使用CE318太阳光度计、热成像仪和光谱仪等仪器收集互补的大气和表面数据，然后对这些数据进行处理和校准以进行分析。
